features: 2 in 1 Airplane Toys - Our glider boy toy is equipped with 4 different colors of yellow, green, orange, and blue gliding foam planes, and 1 plane launcher. By throwing planes by hand or flying them with the launcher, kids can cultivate their hand-eye coordination, observation, and sense of direction

Safe & Fun for Play - This foam airplane is made of molded foam, lightweight, safe, bendable, and will not harm kids' hands or feet, and comes with colorful LED lights, so kids can enjoy the fun of flying toys even at night. It allows your child to leave the video game, relax with friends and family, and enjoy a good outdoor time

3 Fun Ways To Play - Foam glider-led plans can not only use the airplane launcher to achieve flight, but also can be thrown airplane toys into the sky and ground manually, or slid by hand boys toys. This plane brings endless fun to children, and outdoor toys and more novel ways to play are waiting for you to discover! In addition, glider planes for kids have no restrictions on the launch site, you can play indoors and outdoors!

Catapult Plane Toys Accessories - Foam airplanes for kids include 4-pack airplanes and 1 launcher. Come with colorful LED lights, so kids can enjoy the fun no matter day or night for outdoor activities, and will increase their interest in flying

✈Ideal Kids Gifts: Best birthday Christmas gift for 4-8 years of boys girls. Also, this will be a cool glider plane for kids, it is a good choice for toy gifts for kids on Easter, Christmas, Halloween, Thanksgiving Day, New Year, etc., Or being party favors for aviation and airplane themes, birthdays

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,358 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buy for the house. The planes go a decent distance! The only note here is they are a bit fragile but the lever is easy to pull back even for small children. My 8 year old loved this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and well made
reviews.reviewText: These airplanes and launching gun are an excellent toy! My son got these for Christmas and they are very nice quality and were easy to assemble the planes. They launch so far away and the light up feature is great. I would definitely purchase these again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My son loves them but we had to play a bit to get them to fly
reviews.reviewText: WE followed directions with these little planes and had a tough time getting them to fly right. The launcher worked fine. I had to do some adjusting to get the planes to fly more them 5 or so feet without diving to the ground. (even after following the directions). One we had to put the wings upside down for it to work. Overall, cute, fun toy for the little ones. With a tad of knowldedge of how planes work they are fun to play with. However, since they were a tad of an issue for my son (8) to figure out alone without almost breaking while trying to "bend" the back as the instructions suggest. I have to drop a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my nine year old grandson for Christmas and he absolutely loves them. Of course they arrived fast and on time. They are very fun to play with. He likes to use the gun to launch them but the younger kids love to self propel them. They have lots of fun indoors and outdoors. The planes are very light yet very sturdy. These planes have been through it since Christmas Day and they are still intact and working fine. I was debating on purchasing another set but the way these kids are gravitating towards these, I’m going to have to purchase two more. We love these so much!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids loved this toy. Easy to assemble. Lights on the front of the plane. They give 4/5 plans. Made out of styrofoam so they don’t damage walls. They shoot pretty far and brough lots of enjoys to the kids. I’d definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Omg sooo much fun
reviews.reviewText: This is by far one of the best we’ve bought from Amazon. My son had so much fun flying these outside. It was easy to put together and fun to play with. Definitely worth every penny. Don’t wait run….go buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ingenious but Simple Toy
reviews.reviewText: Our kids, especially the boys, loved these and were shooting them all day long. The planes are made out of pretty sturdy foam, allowing for hours of plane launching. They eventually got broken, but mostly because too small of children got a-hold of them and, since it's winter, they were using them inside mostly, leading to their early demise. Definitely more of an outside toy. Overall we got our money's worth though. May purchase again keeping the above in mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Our son LOVES these!
reviews.reviewText: We got this as a gift for our toddler and he is in love! The planes fly great and soar high. My husband has fun shooting the gun. It’s such a great outdoor activity to keep toddlers entertained. I got it for our two year old who got the hang of it pretty quickly. Once we get the plane on the gun he knows how to shoot it. Highly recommend this as a gift especially for those who live on land! We live in the country and it’s so cool to see how far these planes go! You can also throw the planes without the gun and they go a decent distance but not as far as when using the gun. Highly recommend!!
